title: Naughty Or Nice? One Brain Scan Is Now All It Takes To Find Out
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Technology - Today 
With a simple scan of your brain at rest, scientists can now guess whether — on average — you are naughty or nice. “We have now begun ...
